entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 9 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
